title: username change
body:
PLEASE make it so that we can change our usernames (login) because some of my friends know my username but not my password, and i am afrid that they are going to hack me so PLEASE make it so that we can change. ty
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: id love to see us being able to change our username as well, or at least allow us to only once like blizzard

Changing username is not something we currently provide.  As an alternative, I suggest using our[ account security ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)guide for some security practices and tips on protecting your account details.  Hope that helps!
